attributes.action: stop the use of private companies charging nhs staff fees for parking at their place of work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most nhs hospitals use private parking companies to regulate the use of car parking services. Staff, many of whom are on low wages, are obliged to pay for the right to park at their place of work. It is disgraceful that staff who choose to work for the benefit of their communities have to pay a private company in order to be able to do this
